byline.contributor: Diaa Hadid reported from Jerusalem, and Somini Sengupta from the United Nations.
byline.original: By DIAA HADID and SOMINI SENGUPTA

abstract: Israel announces sweeping measures to limit movement of Palestinian residents of occupied West Bank and to punish government there in wake of two deadly attacks against Israeli civilians.

headline.print_headline: Israel Imposes Tough Restrictions on Palestinians in West Bank After Attacks
headline.main: Israel Imposes Restrictions on Palestinians in West Bank After Attacks

snippet: Israel said that it would prevent all Palestinian movement in the southern West Bank and withhold some crucial tax revenues from the Palestinian Authority....
lead_paragraph: Israel said that it would prevent all Palestinian movement in the southern West Bank and withhold some crucial tax revenues from the Palestinian Authority.
